start.title: Let’s get started
start.subt_title: Create or restore your Zilliqa wallet.

restore.title: Restore.
restore.placeholder: Input secret phrase, with a space between words.

setup_acc.title: Setup account.
setup_acc.name_description: A wallet name is using to help you distinguish different account from one another.

wallet_created.title: Wallet is generated!
wallet_created.subt_title: Your account has been created - Keep your secret phase safe, it’s your responsibility!

tips.title: Tips on storing it safely
list: Save a backup in multiple places
Never share the phrase with anyone
Be careful of phising! ZilPay will never spontaneously ask for your secret phrase
If you need to back up your secret phrase again, you can find it in Security
If you ever have a question or see something fishy, contact us.
tips.warn: ZilPay team cannot recover your secret phrase!
